skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: twenty four seven the sound
des:
Your one touch access for Today’s R&B, Old School & Throwback Jams for the entire family. You can expect to hear artist like Maxwell, Alicia Keys, Fantasia, Anthony Hamilton, Puff Daddy, Mint Condition, Mary J. Blige, Tupac. 247, Biggie Smalls and more. 

247 The Sound is your Alternative Urban Radio that seeks to reach all music lovers of R&B worldwide. We are large supporters of Independent Artist looking to spread their wings and showcase their music. 

247 The Sound is guaranteed to keep you listening for hours as you will love and appreciate each selection of music we play. Enjoy our format of music each hour, be informed, be empowered, be educated, be blessed and most of all share us with family, friends and on social media. You won't be able to keep our sound to yourself, so enjoy your Digital Radio Now-247 The Sound.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
